alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 5:11PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect south central Cuyahoga...eastern Medina...western Summit and northeastern Wayne Counties Until 615 PM EST.... At 508 PM EST, radar indicated an band of lake effect snow located near a line from Broadview Heights southward to near Wadsworth. This band will wobble across this area as it slowly drifts southward through 615 pm. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations that may be impacted include...Akron, Cuyahoga Falls, North Royalton, Barberton, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Norton, Hinckley, Fairlawn, Richfield, Clinton, Marshallville, Peninsula, Montrose-Ghent and Pigeon Creek. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 305, 316, 602, 603, 613, and 614.
